verse:
द्वा सुपर्णा सयुजा सखाया समानं वृक्षं परिषस्वजाते।
तयोरन्यः पिप्पलं स्वाद्वत्त्यनश्नन्नन्यो अभिचाकशीति ॥
meaning: Two birds, joined together as friends of same caste sits on the same tree. Of the two, one bird jeev(experiencer), tasting/experiencing the tree of worldly existence maya(experienced), while the other bird does not eat it.
